page.title: 20CHURCHES.
page.content: In the study area there is only one church{St.Francis C.of E.,}which is a subsidary to{Fawley Parish Church of {All Saints.}The community is served by six churches within the local area. {All Saints Fawley}and{St.Francis {Langley,}both C.of E.,are administered by the rev.Christopher Rich,rector, rev.David Walford and Mrs.Phyllis Manhood. The Roman Catholic community is served by{St. Bernards Church}at Holbury under the guidance of Father Charles Aylwood. The{Baptist Church}at Blackfield is under the control of Mr. Pope. There is also a{Methodist Church at Fawley under the supervision of Mr. Beech & a{Pentacostal Hall}at Hardley. Of 365 children surveyed,10 go to Blackfield Baptist,6 All Sts. Fawley,6 St. Bernards Holbury,5 St. Francis Langley,2 Fawley Methodist and 1 to the Pentacostal church at Hardley.
